review_notes:
Mediora requires a Jellyfin media server to function. We have provided a demo server for testing purposes with sample content.

Demo Server: http://demo.jellyfin.org/stable
Username: demo
Password: (leave empty)

To test the app:
1. Open Mediora on Apple TV
2. Navigate to Settings using the sidebar
3. Enter the server URL above in the Jellyfin Server URL field
4. Enter the demo credentials
5. Tap Connect/Save
6. Return to Home to browse the library
7. Select any media item to view details
8. Press Play to test playback

Navigation:
- Use the Siri Remote trackpad to navigate
- Press Menu to go back
- Use the sidebar on the left to switch between sections

The app does not collect any user data. All communication is directly between the app and the user's configured media servers.
